mapper.select: /* S_FUNCTION_COMBO */ SELECT A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID AS CODE_VALUE , A.FUNCTION_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) || ' (' || A.FUNCTION_CODE || ')' AS CODE_NAME , A.DESCRIPTION , A.ATTRIBUTE1 , A.ATTRIBUTE2 , A.ATTRIBUTE3 , A.ATTRIBUTE4 , A.ATTRIBUTE5 , A.ATTRIBUTE6 , A.ATTRIBUTE7 , A.ATTRIBUTE8 , A.ATTRIBUTE9 , A.ATTRIBUTE10 FROM COMM_FUNCTION A WHERE A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID = A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID ORDER BY A.MLG_CODE ASC
